decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:1573-5101573-1001573-1101573-2001573-1201573-3001573-5001573-001573-10Planning Supportive Statement Design and Access Statement Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the residential use of 6 Bridle CloseEnfield EN3 6EA and shall not be occupied independently as a self-contained unit.Reason: To ensure that the outbuilding does not adversely affect the amenity of adjoining residential premises, is not out of keeping with the pattern of surrounding development and is not used for unauthorised purposes, in accordance with Development Plan Policies.

The glazing serving the additional side windows as seen along the proposed northern side elevation of the development shown on drawing No.1573-200 Rev A, shall be in obscured glass with an equivalent obscuration as level 3 on the Pilkington Obscuration Range and the window shall be non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed. The glazing shall not be altered without the approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To safeguard the privacy of the occupiers of adjoining and neighbouring properties

The proposed side windows as seen along the northern side elevation of the development shall not open outwards towards the private side road to the north of the subject site. Reason: To prevent obstruction of the adjoining access road which is outside the ite boundary.
description: Erection of single storey outbuilding to the rear to be used as a residential annex.
